_header: Upon a time as Jesu went
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; James the Great, saint
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo sancti Iacobi maioris’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Uppon a tyme as Ihesu wentTo him a wommon com
                    present…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þider mote he vs bringeÞat maade of nouȝt alle
                    þinge. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Accessit ad Ihesus mater filiorum zebedei (f.
                    223vc)
